name: Ankh Bar
description:
The Afterlife is an exclusive club, and as the bouncer for the other side it's your job to keep the impure souls out. Roll and dash your way through the tombs of the dead to keep the bar classy.

Controls:
A/D + Spacebar: Dash
Left Mouse Button: Charge

This is a submission for Mini Jam 46: Justice
Limitation: 5 Colors

Credits to these lovely people:
https://legiongames.itch.io/
https://sleepygibbs.itch.io/
